SEARCH
Package userInterface

Class InvenManageUI

java.lang.Object
userInterface.InvenManageUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
InvenManageInterface
public class InvenManageUI extends Object implements InvenManageInterface
This class provides a user interface for managing the inventory of medications.

It includes methods for viewing inventory, managing stock levels, and handling low-level alerts. This class is designed to be used by administrators and pharmacists.

    • chooseMedicine

      public void chooseMedicine(Scanner sc, Role role)
      Allows the user to select a medication for further actions based on their role.

      Administrators can manage the stock, while pharmacists can submit replenish requests.

      Specified by:
      chooseMedicine in interface InvenManageInterface
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      role - The Role of the user (Administrator or Pharmacist).

    • manageMedicine

      public void manageMedicine(Scanner sc, Medicine medicine)
      Provides administrators with options to manage a specific medication's stock.
      Specified by:
      manageMedicine in interface InvenManageInterface
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      medicine - The selected Medicine to manage.
